content: I was wondering what codes refer to the Vaccination details and testing (especially covid) and is there a directory of other codes for different parts of data?
Hi @Asnee Fernando not sure you have addressed the question in the right stream...but maybe I misunderstood your question...
Hi Giorgio , my team is trying to pull certain info such as vaccine details and testing details from the FHir server but not sure what code or parameters we should be looking into to pull in the info

If you are looking for FHIR terminology services you may ask the terminology stream
If you have instead a more generic question you may ask the implementers stream
This stream is dedicated to the implementation with FHIR of the FAIR principles
